domosaics.ui.views.view.manager
Interface SelectionManager<C extends ViewComponent>

Type Parameters:
C - the generic type of the ViewComponent
All Superinterfaces:
ViewManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultSelectionManager
public interface SelectionManager<C extends ViewComponent>
extends ViewManager

The SelectionManager is a ViewManager which handles the selection of ViewComponents. In most cases it would be triggered by mouseHandlers to respond to user interaction.
Of course its also possible to use this manager for manually selection when working in actions.

This interface describes methods for handling mouse over selections as well as selections which can be triggered by mouse clicks. Again the specifics should be implemented by MouseListeners or actions.

The basic implementation of this interface is DefaultSelectionManager To extend or overwrite some of the basic functionalities the DefaultSelectionManager should be extended.

The extending of the ViewManager interface ensures the communication with the observed view.

Author:
Andreas Held
